about_the_game:
Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon!

Embark on a cracking cleaning adventure that’ll take you from charming British suburbs to cheesy celestial bodies. Watch this space for more info and wishlist for updates, old chum.
detailed_description:
Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon!

Embark on a cracking cleaning adventure that’ll take you from charming British suburbs to cheesy celestial bodies. Watch this space for more info and wishlist for updates, old chum.

name: PowerWash Simulator – Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
short_description: Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon! Fire up WASH LAD, Wallace’s latest quirky contraption, and commence the most cracking of clean-ups. The patent may be pending but Project Scrub Down can’t wait!
supported_languages: English, Korean, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
